name: Battle Knights
description: Play as the blue knight, Wonder, who is on a quest to unite the colored realms. Battle Knights is the kind of game you remember playing back in the days of the NES and SNES. It's an easy to play yet challenging platformer.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i3 @ 2.00 GHz or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4600 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 2.00 GHz or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 460, HD 6850 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
